TopicTitle: KSP Gets Stolen Back By Epic Games

Articles.Content:
ok so first of all, at the beginning of the story i had ksp from epic games during that sale where it was free for some time.

ive had it for the past like 3 months and loved playing it (i modded it too)

but a day i decided to reinstall it because i had some mods i installed incorrectly so when i pressed uninstall, epic games just tells me that this game is not in the players' library and disappears.
like into thin air it just disappears and if i check the store page it tells me to buy it again. now im here confused why epic games just steals ksp back with no other explanation.

a few files from the ksp still exists for some reason like the main english file, some part file thats empty and a few other things. so anyone got an explanation to this?

Edited November 1, 2023 by YT_RageBeast
